name: Felocity
description:
Hello!

This is my entry for Ludum Dare 41. The theme was "Combine 2 Incompatible Genres" so I chose bullet hell and virtual pet.

In this game you have to make sure your cat gets to eat, clean, and play properly, all while dodging evil cucumbers and rats. Shooting rats increases PLAY, eating dead rats increases FOOD, and bathing in water increases CLEAN.

Controls (keyboard/gamepad):
Move - WASD / left joystick
Shoot (with gun equipped) - SPACE / A-button
Select/continue (in menus) - SPACE / A-button
